title: Examen: Facturas y Futuro con Going To

questions.question: What is 'Direct Debit'?
options: An automatic payment from your bank account
questions.explanation: Direct debit es la domiciliación bancaria (pago automático).

questions.question: Choose the correct future sentence:
options: I going to pay the bill.
I am going to pay the bill.
I am go to pay the bill.
questions.explanation: La estructura es: am/is/are + going to + verb.

questions.question: What does 'Due Date' mean?
options: The day you receive the bill
The day you must pay the bill
questions.explanation: Due date es la fecha de vencimiento o límite de pago.

questions.question: Which of these is a 'Utility' service?
questions.explanation: La electricidad es un servicio básico (utility).

questions.question: How do you form the negative of 'Going to' for 'He'?
questions.explanation: El negativo para 'he' es 'is not going to' (he isn't going to).
